- the kings -

(yup! that's our surname.)

We're Candy and Jonty King, and we're going to make you TikTok famous! For the last 3 years, we've been building the most supportive community of travel-hungry, enthusiastic fans. Although, we LOVE beautifully curated videography and photography, our strongest and most valuable asset is showing off our personality and the brands we love through fun, relatable content that goes viral every time! We want to do this with you too!

"80% of consumers have purchased something via an influencer recommendation." - startupbonsai.com

I'm ready to enquire.

ok, but who even are you?

Great question! Over to Candy first for a brief introduction. "Lol. That's something I ask myself every morning. A part from being outgoing and good in front of the camera, I am also a master sales person. I can sell ice to a penguin! With 3 million followers, this fierce skill of mine is an investment for all brands I work with, and myself - of course."

Anything else? "Yup, I have a Bachelor Degree in Brand Communications, I'm a Copywriting and storytelling specialist annnnd this gal has 8 years experience in social media growth. But that's not all. I also have 8 years experience working in international markets - something that not too many South Africans can say."

Thanks, Candy. Jonty, you're up. Tell us a bit about you. "Well, when words can't describe a setting, I let my camera do the work." Sounds like you're the photographer here? "Correct. I have a wealth of experience in creating beautiful imagery for brands, hotels and the tourism industry - I capture unique selling points that drive sales and repeat customers. The funny thing is that I actually have a Bachelor Degree in Environmental Management, but shortly after university, I became a photographer and videographer. I'm also a strategist and collaboration specialist with 8 years experience in social media growth and 8 years experience working in international markets.

All of this experience and our fierce knowledge in marketing is the foundation of our social media presence and each of our collaborations. Our strong brand image and our social media presence speaks for itself with multiple features, tags and interviews about us. We've also been on the news, in the newspapers and found in many online articles. So when we say that "we create viral content" we mean it.

"Influencer marketing ROI is 11x greater than banner ads."- startupbonsai.com

I want to go viral

check out some of our previous clients, client reviews and press features below!

 

We've worked with some of the most renowned brands in the world along with 50+ other incredible brands. All our collaborations include content creation both photography and videography that converts to sales. Our collaborations also include promoting these brands to our 3+ million followers whom we have a strong relationship with.

what they are saying about us

@tembohousehotel

It was honestly a great experience hosting you and your partner at Tembo House Hotel.

Top professionals, very friendly and open to idea's, charmed us all the very first moment you entered.

We have worked with many social media bloggers, by far you and your partner were the top we have come across, a true pleasure to work with.

Thank you once again for giving us the opportunity to work with you, and providing us with great content, from shots to videography to promote our hotel.

Feedback has been great from potential guests.


Rahim Amigo, Managing Director of Tembo House Hotel

@theinsidehouse

We were so lucky to work with Candy and the Kings at The Inside House- Chiang Mai. Working with them was a real joy. They are very professional, yet so creative. The contents they created are beyond what we have imagined. It was the pure work of art. They also gave us many recommendations for the social media strategies and planning. We are very pleased to have them with us, and will absolutely recommend for anyone interested in a fine collection of collaboration.


Tea Krai, GM of The Inside House

@cielosamui

Candy and Jonty are amazing! So professional, with great ideas and with a real sense of aesthetic. They know how to take the best pictures and how to use them to promote your place . Working with them has been a pleasure. I definitely recommend!


Pauline Cabessa, Owner of Cielo Boutique Hotel

@maisondalabua

For the last month, Candy and Jonty worked with us at Maison Dalabua, Manda de Laos and Gaspard. As the social media manager for all businesses, their strategies and inside tips have definitely stepped up our online presence. They are very talented at what they do and lovely, hardworking people! Thank you Candy and Jonty for all the content you created and specially for your Social Media Course, which I highly recommend for anyone ready to step up their social media game.


Mo Mont, Social Media Manager of Maison Dalabua

@zarafa_house

Candy and Jonty took photos of my holiday home in Diani Beach, Kenya. The most memorable photo is used nowadays as a welcome card and our guests love it!

Working with them was great from start to finish. They offered great advice on best shots for different uses (social media, advertisement, website etc).

Besides the photos, the most important outcome of working with them is that they made me understand how to use social media to showcase my B&B, for which I will be forever grateful.

Very happy with the end result with positive feedback from travel agents and potential customers.

Highly recommended!


Ann Rietjens, Owner of Zarafa House
